title: Fixed grade calculation algorithm
content: Fixed the algorithm that calculates grades to make it actually accurate. You might see some of your grades drop due to the previously inaccurate calculation.

title: Added a changelog
content: You'll now be notified of new updates.

title: Removed Invalid Breakdowns
content: Removed the See Breakdown link on classes that don't have breakdowns.

title: Updated grade calculation algorithm
content: Fixed the ratings for A, B+ and B-- you should see higher grades now!

title: Added previous grades for CanvasCBL+ Users
content: See what your grades were when you last logged in-- along with the changes and when that last login was with CanvasCBL+.

title: Fixed issues with Safari
content: If you're still having issues, go to Settings -> Safari -> Clear History and Website Data, then log back in.

title: Added privacy policy to the Dashboard
content: View it anytime by going to More Actions, then clicking on View Privacy Policy.

title: Added Extension
content: Add CanvasCBL to your Canvas sidebar with the new CanvasCBL chrome extension! Download it from the More Actions menu or by

title: Added mobile site
content: CanvasCBL has been rebuilt from the ground-up for mobile. Go to CanvasCBL.com on your phone to check it out!

title: Updated grade calculation algorithm
content: Now reflects success skills changes and 75% rounds down.

title: Updated grade calculation algorithm
content: B and B- no longer has a minimum score.

title: Updated grade calculation algorithm
content: We now correctly identify and process success skills outcomes.

title: Updated grade calculation algorithm
content: Changed the way we process success skills to do it correctly. Please email us (More Actions -> Support) if you see an issue.

title: Welcome to Semester 2!
content: We've done a complete reworking of CanvasCBL to make your semester 2 as great as it can be.

title: Added GPA calculation
content: We've added your GPA to the grades page!

title: Fixed GPA calculation
content: Previously, classes without a grade were treated as I's. We've fixed this so your GPAs are correct.

title: Added grade change notifications
content: Get an email when your grades change. Turn then on
